review_title: An inspiring and exciting place to work
pros: Exciting growth - due to double in size in 2016/17. Entrepreneurial spirit for a not-for-profit. Breathtaking locations to work in. Excellent discounts on lunch, the shops and site entry. Fulfilling work - the charity delivers excellent exhibitions and inspiring programmes.
cons: Limited to travelling by car to 2 of 4 sites. With there being several sites, it can mean that staff do not meet for long periods.
